activities: Alpine Access operates as a call center on behalf its clients, who maintain customers who utilize Alpine Access for handling of the issues, as defined by Alpine Access’ contract with its clients.  All data handled and transmitted by Alpine Access has been previously approved by its clients during Alpine Access’ project scoping and negotiation and maintained within signed contracts by Alpine Access.  Alpine Access does not receive data from Switzerland.
corpofftitle1: Executive Vice President and General Counsel
personaldata: All data handled and transmitted by Alpine Access has been previously approved by its clients during Alpine Access’ project scoping and negotiation and maintained within signed contracts by Alpine Access.  All call center operations are handled through Alpine Access automated internal systems and as such, Alpine Access does not maintain any manual processes for client or customer data.
privacyprograms: Alpine Access’ customer call center operations and associated privacy program have been implemented to align Alpine Access privacy controls with EU Safe Harbor controls.
recoursemech: Alpine Access utilizes American Arbitration Association (AAA) as its independent recourse third party entity to resolve complaints that cannot be resolved in-house.
